text: CLOSE USA TODAY staffers taste test the new M & M's Crunchy Raspberry, Mint and Espresso. Josmar Taveras, USA TODAY M & M's come in an array of flavors, and the peanut brand is about to get three more. ( Photo : MATT MENDELSOHN, USAT ) M & M's is going nuts with new flavors. The brand will unveil three new offerings – English Toffee Peanut, Mexican Jalapeno Peanut and Thai Coconut Peanut – in 2019, according to the Instagram account of the food vlog SnackChatLive, which included a photo of the trio.
